text: Both my kids graduated from Appleland Playhouse, and I am so grateful for the care and dedication of the teachers and staff. This is a school with a lot of heart, instilling strong family values and creating a nurturing environment for children to thrive. Highly recommended!

Appleland is a great preschool! My son genuinely looks forward to attending school every day. The teachers are fantastic, creating a positive and supportive learning environment. The school itself is very charming and spacious, and they frequently organize fantastic events and special classes. Highly recommended!

Family oriented pre school with on-site kitchen serving freshly cooked meals for students. Parents are kept updated with child’s progress and activities. The school also hosts numerous activities and celebrations throughout the year. Finally, staff and teachers help foster a good learning environment for the students. Highly recommended!

I would like to thank all the management, staff and teachers for taking great care of my two girls since 2020 till date. So glad I found this school. Parents are always kept updated of our child's progress and activities in school. Highly recommended if you are considering to enroll your child here!

A very family-oriented childcare centre with a rare on-site kitchen that uses fresh ingredients from the supermarket nearby everyday, and refreshingly family atmosphere that’s different from the usual franchise chains.
